description:
[![DOI](https://zenodo.org/badge/{{ zenodo_badge_id }}.svg)](https://zenodo.org/badge/latestdoi/{{ zenodo_badge_id }})

This is a README file for a data repository originating from the DCML corpus initiative and serves as welcome page for both

  • the GitHub repo https://github.com/DCMLab/bach_chorales and the corresponding
  • documentation page https://dcmlab.github.io/bach_chorales

For information on how to obtain and use the dataset, please refer to this documentation page.

 

Johann Sebastian Bach – The Chorales

The original Capella files (not included here) were engraved and compiled by Ulrich Kaiser and published as part of the CD-ROM coming with his book

Kaiser, U. (2002). Der Vierstimmige Satz. Kantionalsatz und Choralsatz. Bärenreiter, Kassel.

They have been converted to MuseScore 3.6.2 format and parsed using the ms3 Python library. Unfortunately, the conversion has resulted in many incorrect accidentals and the MuseScore files would require full correction. One way to do so would be by comparing pitch class vectors against those from one of the other available chorale datasets.

 

Version history

See the GitHub releases.

 

License

CC0 1.0 Universal (CC0-1.0).

 

Overview
